text: The World Group I Play-offs were four ties which involved the losing nations of the World Group and the winning nations of the World Group II. Nations that won their play-off ties entered the 2019 World Group, while losing nations joined the 2019 World Group II. {| class="wikitable" style="width:100%;" |- !colspan=4|Participating Teams |- !style="width:25%;"| !style="width:25%;"| !style="width:25%;"| !style="width:25%;"| |- !style="width:25%;"| !style="width:25%;"| !style="width:25%;"| !style="width:25%;"| |} == Belarus vs. Slovakia == == Romania vs. Switzerland == == Australia vs. Netherlands == == Italy vs. Belgium == == References == World Group Play-offs
title: 2018 Fed Cup World Group Play-offs
